ack.p: The authors thank the Director of Basic and Applied Scientific Research Centre (BASR) at Imam Abdulrahman Bin Faisal University, Dammam, Saudi Arabia for her continuous support and encouragement. The authors would like to thank Dr. Ahmed Alsayyah, Dr. Reem AlJindan, and Mrs. Nouf Alromaihi at King Fahd Hospital, Al Khobar, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for providing us with the microorganisms for testing.
